4. City Council

City Council
============

Vision and Strategic Priorities
-------------------------------

### The City Council's vision is to foster and preserve the small-town culture in our growing community. The culture of Marble Falls is unique and reflects our historical heritage, traditions, close-knit community, and shared sense of identity.

### [2025-2027 Strategic Priorities](https://marblefallstx.gov/DocumentCenter/View/9982/2025-2027-City-Council-Strategic-Goals)

### Contact Us

1. City of Marble Falls  
   800 3rd Street  
   Marble Falls, TX 78654

   Phone: [830-693-3615](tel:830-693-3615)  
   Fax: 830-693-6737

   [Webmaster](mailto:cmcdonald@marblefallstx.gov)

1. Hours
   -----

   Monday through Thursday  
   8 a.m. to 5:30 pm.

   Friday  
   8 a.m. to 5 p.m.
